ARABIC: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفْتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ لَا يُفْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'People who invent lies against Allah will not be successful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Those who fabricate lies about God will never succeed."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them (O Muhammad!): 'Indeed those who invent lies against Allah will never prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell them, "Those who invent falsehood against God will have no happiness".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “Indeed those who fabricate lies against Allah will never succeed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Verily, those who invent a lie against Allah will never be successful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Those who forge a lie against Allah shall not be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Those who forge against God falsehood shall not prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Verily those who invent a lie concerning Allah will not succeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Those who invent falsehoods about God shall not prosper."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: verily those who fabricate a lie against Allah shall not fare well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Indeed those who fabricate lies against Allah will not be felicitous.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Those who invent a lie against Allah will never prosper."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "Verily, those who invent lie against Allah will never be successful"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Those who forge falsehoods against Allah shall not prosper'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Those who fabricate lies about God will not succeed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:69] Say: ‘Truly those who invent lies concerning God, by attributing offspring to Him, shall not prosper’, they shall not find happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad: (Verily those who invent a lie concerning Allah will not succeed) they will not escape Allah's punishment nor will they be safe.
